td.content: s:patient presents with 2 years history of mild low back pain. she is a F retired aged 77 Ys. denies any smoking she drinks at least 4 beers a day o:Height 154 cm, Weight 71.6 kg, Temperature 37.2 C, Pulse 81, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 17, patient appears in mild distress due to back pain a:Low Back Pain p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Methocarbamol - 1500 mg po q 12h x 3 days, and ordered CBC, HLA B27, spine XRY.

Value.Value: ordered CBC , HLA B 27 , spine XRY

content2.Value: ordered CBC , HLA B 27 , spine XRY

td.content: s:patient with mild pain radiating from the back to the buttocks and mild low back pain. she has had several such episodes over past 12 months. she is a white F retired aged 78 yrs. she is a heavy drinker she does not smoke o:Height 153 cm, Weight 70.3 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 97, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 68, Respiration 15, patient appears in mild distress due to back pain a:Low Back Pain p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed Alendronate sodium - 70 mg po q week, and ordered lumbar XRY, Skeletal System DEXA scan.

Value.Value: ordered lumbar XRY , Skeletal System DEXA scan

content2.Value: ordered lumbar XRY , Skeletal System DEXA scan

td.content: Do not IV Fluid and Support
